product_name: ExOfficio BugsAway Chas'r Crew Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Travel comfortably in sunny and buggy locales with the ExOfficio BugsAway(R) Chas'r(TM) Crew Shirt. It has a UPF 30 rating and is treated to repel biting insects. EPA-registered, odorless Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel helps keep biting and potentially disease-carrying insects at bay. Insect Shield is effective through 70 washings. Soft blend of cotton and polyester provides UPF 30 protection from the sun; fabric wicks moisture, resists wrinkles and dries fast. ExOfficio BugsAway Chas'r Crew Shirt has a natural fit. Closeout.
short_description: Travel comfortably in sunny and buggy locales with the ExOfficio BugsAway(R) Chas'r(TM) Crew Shirt. It has a UPF 30 rating and is treated to repel biting insects.
